signature: boolean linesIntersect(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double)

enhanced_by.method_name: relativeCCW(double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: The linesIntersect method relies on the relativeCCW method to determine the relative position of points with respect to line segments, which is crucial for the intersection logic.

enhanced_by.method_name: ptSegDist(double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve calculations related to line segments and points, suggesting similar input patterns and potential reuse of setup code.
The intersectsLine method directly calls linesIntersect, indicating a clear dependency where linesIntersect must be tested after setting up the Line2D objects.
